column3: str

Vuyargur has restocking on the agenda.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the Yok Huy supplier at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
Deliver the requested items to the Yok Huy supplier.
Speak with Vuyargur.
Speak with the Yok Huy supplier at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

<hex:0208F20320E4E8050AFF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FFF202C0><hex:0208F202BAE4E8050BFF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FFF2025A><hex:0208F20254E4E8050CFF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FFF201F4><hex:0208F201EEE4E80509FF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FFF2018E><hex:0208F20188E4E8050DFF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FFF20128><hex:0208F20122E4E8050EFF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FFC5><hex:0208C1E4E8050FFF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FF63><hex:02085FE4E80510FF57><hex:020853E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF30>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the Yok Huy supplier<hex:03><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03>.
Speak with Vuyargur.
I'm told the restoration workers residing on the mountain are running low on critical materials. We've a mind to replenish a few daily necessities, if you're willing to contribute.
Our supplier at Warmth has but recently taken inventory. He should be able to give you a more detailed report of what we currently lack.
The workers tell me our stock of daily necessities is dwindling yet again. I'd like to resupply our stores as soon as possible─with your invaluable aid, of course.
In light of this, I imagine the supplier at Warmth has already taken inventory. He should be able to inform you of the goods we currently lack.
With so many restoration workers choosing to dwell here, the demand for living necessities increases by the day... That said, we can barely keep up.
We're sorely in need of silverware, so I'd like to make that our first priority. I've already prepared the necessary materials─you are free to take more from the crate there, should you require it.

We're sorely in need of cleaning cloths, so I'd like to make that our first priority. I've already prepared the necessary materials─you are free to take more from the crate there, should you require it.
We're sorely in need of medicine, so I'd like to make that our first priority. I've already prepared the necessary materials─you are free to take more from the crate there, should you require it.
The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
You obtain additional crafting materials from the crate.
Ah, you're back. The crafting went smoothly, I take it?
Let's see here... Yes, this is just enough! On behalf of our workers, I offer my thanks.

Your presence is a gift to us, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>, and I am sure Vuyargur is of the same mind. I wager he's just as eager to hear of your efforts, so I'll leave you to report the good news to him.
Thank you again, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. Now, you'd best be off to Vuyargur. Wouldn't want to keep him waiting, would you?

The restocking went smoothly? Excellent! Many thanks to you, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. The journey from the peaks to Worlar's Echo is a lengthy one, which makes replenishing our supplies a rather thorny task...
Until we are fully self-sufficient, your aid will be vital to us, just as it was today. It is my hope that we can count on you again when next our stores grow scarce.
